snippet: Tony Stewart, who will miss the rest of the Nascar season because of a broken right leg, will be replaced by Austin Dillon and Mark Martin.
abstract: Tony Stewart will miss the rest of the Nascar season because of broken right leg sustained in a sprint car crash Aug 5; will be replaced by Austin Dillon and Mark Martin.
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart, who will miss the rest of the Nascar season because of a broken right leg, will be replaced by Austin Dillon and Mark Martin.

headline.main: Dillon and Martin Will Replace Stewart
headline.print_headline: Dillon and Martin Will Replace Stewart
